analysis.description:
EthertoteToken (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#70-76) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#76)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#297-344):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenSaleTokenBalance() > 0) (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#314)
	- require(bool)(tokens <= tokenSaleTokenBalance()) (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#334-337)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#337-338)

TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#297-344) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#301-303)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < closingTime) (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#303-304)

TokenSale.ethRaisedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#99-100)
TokenSale.maxEthRaised should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#123-124)
TokenSale.maxSpend should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#144-149)
TokenSale.minSpend should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#142-143)
TokenSale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#137-138)
TokenSale.tokenBurnAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#95-96)
TokenSale.tokenContractAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#91-92)
EthertoteToken.thisContractAddress (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#71-72) should be declared external
EthertoteToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#72-76) should be declared external
EthertoteToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#76) should be declared external
TokenSale.getAnyAddressTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#195-199) should be declared external
TokenSale.burnUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#205-213) should be declared external
TokenSale.pauseTokenSale (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#216-230) should be declared external
TokenSale.resumeTokenSale (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#232-258) should be declared external
TokenSale.maximumRaised (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#440-442) should be declared external

TokenSale.delayOpeningTime (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol) should be declared external
Parameter '' of EthertoteToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/47/0x202f291e30fe4aa626792ae01c35eaf7153b44b9.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
